error.cannot_connect_store: We apologize for the inconvenience. The store is currently unavailable, and as a result, you won't be able to make any purchases at this time.
error.client_invalid: The purchase cannot be completed. Please, change your account or device.
error.cloud_service_network_connection_failed: The purchase cannot be completed. Please, check your network connection and try again.
error.cloud_service_permission_denied: The purchase was declined. Please, try again later.
error.cloud_service_revoked: The purchase was declined. Please, try again later.
error.ineligible_for_offer: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
error.invalid_offer_identifier: The promotional offer is invalid or expired.
error.invalid_offer_price: Sorry, your purchase cannot be completed. Please, try again later.
error.invalid_signature: Sorry, an error has occurred when applying the promo code. Please, try again later.
error.missing_offer_params: Sorry, an error has occurred when applying the promo code. Please, try again later.
error.overlay_cancelled: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
error.overlay_invalid_configuration: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
error.overlay_presented_in_background_scene: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
error.overlay_timeout: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
error.payment_invalid: The purchase cannot be completed. Please, check your payment information.
error.payment_not_allowed: The purchase is not available for the selected payment method. Please, make sure your payment method allows you to make online purchases.
error.privacy_acknowledgement_required: The purchase cannot be completed, because you have not accepted the terms of use of the AppStore. Please, confirm your consent in the settings and then return to the purchase.
error.store_product_not_available: This product is not available in your region. Please, change the store and try again.
error.unauthorized_request_data: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
error.unknown: Sorry, the purchase is unavailable for an unknown reason. Please try again later.
error.unsupported_platform: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.

feature.auto_refresh_results: Gain the advantage of automatic result updates.
feature.quicker_refresh_rates: Benefit from quicker updates of exchange rates.

message.do_have_premium_version: You don't have the premium version.
message.enjoy_premium_version: Thank you for choosing the premium version! Enjoy enhanced features and an ad-free experience. Your support means a lot to us!
message.go_premium_description: By upgrading to the premium version, you not only support ongoing development but also gain access to additional features.
message.have_not_acquired_premium_version: You haven't acquired the premium version.
message.one_time_payment: This is a one-time payment and does not incur any recurring charges.
message.premium_version_restored: Your premium features have been successfully reinstated.
message.unlock_premium_features: Access a multitude of premium features.
